programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
set x = "hello"
create principal bob "b"
create principal alice "b"
set delegation x admin delegate -> anyone
return x
***

as principal bob password "b" do
set delegation x bob delegate -> alice
return []
***

as principal admin password "admin" do
delete delegation x admin delegate -> anyone
return []
***

as principal bob password "b" do
set delegation x bob delegate -> alice
return []
***
